GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v5.15.91
GSD.description:
netrom: Fix use-after-free of a listening socket.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.91 by commit d2d3ab1b1de3302de2c85769121fd4f890e47ceb, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit 517a16b1a88bdb6b530f48d5d153478b2552d9a8. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: netrom: Fix use-after-free of a listening socket.
